text: @realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs You are making a fool of yourself. Stop tweeting/stop yacking.... You frighten Americans due to your incompetence. If you had any sense you would bring in a team of the best people to take over. YOU CAN'T HANDLE THE #Coronavirus !!! Neither can @VP !!!
